actions.text: On agreeing to the McBath amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mrs. McBath.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McBath amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 116-61 to provide pharmacy school outreach by directing the Labor HHS and Education Secretaries to do outreach to institutions of higher education as it relates to the use and availability of generic drugs.
purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 116-61 to provide pharmacy school outreach by directing the Labor HHS and Education Secretaries to do outreach to institutions of higher education as it relates to the use and availability of generic drugs.
